title: Not able to log-in server error...?
body: I am not sure why I cant log-in is it because servers are down? {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} we haven't got any info in regards of this -_-"

replies.body: I also can't log back in after I restated my client, ranked queue was messing up.
Report RITO, make sure RIOT gets banned {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}  ok time to watch shaclone {{champion:35}}
